alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 11:59AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Box Elder County through 1230 PM MDT... At 1159 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, or 25 miles southwest of Tremonton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremonton, Howell, Riverside, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Promontory, Penrose, Bothwell, Thatcher and Golden Spike Historic Site. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 382 and 388. Interstate 84 between mile markers 22 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
